title: New: Shadow Shadow – 1000001
body: Over a year since **Shadow Shadow** appeared on the scene with the anthemic [_Riviera_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/16822-new-shadow-shadow-riviera/), **Mattias** **Friberg**, the brains behind the Scandinavian project, has returned with the cinematic, epic pop of _1000001_, featuring vocals from Kicki Halmos. Set to be released in North America via new label Nonchalant, as a double A 7″, with Riviera on the flip side, it’s a stunning introduction to **Shadow Shadow**. It’s wistful, deeply moving synth pop at it’s very best. Check out _1000001_ below, and remind yourself of Riviera underneath that.
